title: Orgasmic Holiday Gift Ideas
itunes:title: Orgasmic Holiday Gift Ideas
itunes:subtitle: Orgasmic Holiday Gift Ideas
description:
‘Tis the season for giving and in this week’s show, Emily and her team are here to help you select the sexiest items to give every “special someone” on your list. Whether you’re shopping for a toy for him, searching for the perfect present for her, or are looking for something you both can share, this holiday gift guide has the perfect mix of products you’ll need to keep things hot through those cold winter months, and every month that follows! We’ve also got some small yet sexy toys and products to share to help you give and get the gift of pleasure, no matter what your shopping budget may be.

If you’re tired of wrapping up socks and sweaters, it’s time to mix things up and give your loved ones something they least expect and most desire. From sexy stocking stuffers to Sybians to stamina-training Fleshlights this holiday gift guide has a little sultry something for everyone on your shopping list. Don’t miss it!


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
